alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:26PM AKST until January 30 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility possible. Total snow accumulations up to 2 inches possible. Winds could gust to 40 mph or higher. Visibility one half mile or less possible. Wind chills to 55 below possible. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to midnight AKST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low 60 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
